# Velo

## Velo

- [Intro](https://docs.velo.xyz/api/intro)
- [News API](https://docs.velo.xyz/api/news-api)
- [Python](https://docs.velo.xyz/api/python): pip install velodata
- [NodeJS](https://docs.velo.xyz/api/nodejs): npm install velo-node
- [HTTP](https://docs.velo.xyz/api/http): HTTP endpoints
- [Columns](https://docs.velo.xyz/api/columns): Supported columns for rows functions
- [Intro](https://docs.velo.xyz/trading/intro)
- [Setup](https://docs.velo.xyz/trading/setup)
- [Usage](https://docs.velo.xyz/trading/usage)
- [Intro](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/intro)
- [Chart](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/chart)
- [Table](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/chart/table)
- [Futures](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/futures)
- [Options](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/options)
- [Panels](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/options/panels)
- [Market](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/market)
- [TradFi](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/tradfi)
- [VeloAI](https://docs.velo.xyz/web-app/veloai)
- [Terms of Service](https://docs.velo.xyz/terms-of-service/terms-of-service)
